content.html: big benefit to a fragmentation of people, thanks to a mass twitter-bail means we will no longer be forced to hang out with complete dickheads maybe a centralised platform where everyone yells at each other wasn’t a good idea actually

big benefit to a fragmentation of people, thanks to a mass twitter-bail means we will no longer be forced to hang out with complete dickheads 

maybe a centralised platform where everyone yells at each other wasn’t a good idea actually
